history.proof: induction A. - simpl. intro H. inversion H. - simpl. destruct (d x a). -- intros _. exists 0. reflexivity. -- intros H. qsimpl time: 1. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "x el A -> {n : nat | pos x A = Some n}" on hypothesis of type "a = x \\/ x el A".

original: induction A. - simpl. intro H. inversion H. - simpl. destruct (d x a). -- intros _. exists 0. reflexivity. -- intros H. apply IHA in H. destruct H as [n Hn]. exists (S n). simpl. rewrite Hn. reflexivity.
